short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ASK the AI about any websites in 1 click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Ask Smart Mind - the Chrome Extension that makes asking questions about any website a breeze!

Features:
- Easy to use: simply select the text you want the answer from and right-click to ask OpenAI Chat GPT.
- Non-intrusive: the extension only executes when you select text, so it won't interfere with your other web activities.
- Privacy-friendly: your data is safe with us.
- Versatile: use it to write replies to your messages and emails, or ask about anything on any website.

With Ask Smart Mind, you'll never have to waste time searching for answers again. Download now and experience the convenience of having an AI-powered assistant at your fingertips!
